description:
ZDoom is a family of enhanced ports of the Doom engine for running on modern operating systems.

It runs on Windows, Linux, and OS X, and adds new features not found in the games as originally published by id Software.
summary: Enhanced port of the Doom engine
author: Randi Heit,  Christoph Oelckers,  Alexey Lysiuk,  Magnus Norddahl,  Rachael Alexanderson,  Braden Obrzut
